technical.short: The division between Vessels of Bestowal (GE) and Vessels of Reception (AHP)
technical.long: When a Face is in a state of smallness, the upper part including the vessels Crown and Wisdom are kept intact while the lower part including the vessels Understanding, Beauty and Kingdom are detached to the face below. The division between them is called the Chest.

technical.short: First Face in the World of Primordial Man

explanation.short: First Spiritual World After Crossing the Barrier

source.long: And the angel of God who went before the camp of Israel, removed and went behind them; and the pillar of cloud removed from before them, and stood behind them. (Exodus 14:19)

And it came between the camp of Egypt and the camp of Israel; and there was the cloud and the darkness here, yet gave it light by night there; and the one came not near the other all the night. (Exodus 14:20)
And Moses stretched out his hand over the sea, and the Lord led the sea with the strong east wind all night, and He made the sea into dry land and the waters split. (Exodus 14:21)
